dagger.producers.internal

Class Producers

  • java.lang.Object
    • dagger.producers.internal.Producers

  • public final class Producers
extends Object
    Utility methods for use in generated producer code.
    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Jesse Beder

    • Method Detail

      • createFutureProduced

        public static <T> com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<Produced<T>> createFutureProduced(com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<T> future)
        Returns a future of Produced that represents the completion (either success or failure) of the given future. If the input future succeeds, then the resulting future also succeeds with a successful Produced; if the input future fails, then the resulting future succeeds with a failing Produced.

        Cancelling the resulting future will propagate the cancellation to the input future; but cancelling the input future will trigger the resulting future to succeed with a failing Produced.

      • createFutureSingletonSet

        public static <T> com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<Set<T>> createFutureSingletonSet(com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<T> future)
        Returns a future of a Set that contains a single element: the result of the input future.

      • submitToExecutor

        public static <T> com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<T> submitToExecutor(Callable<T> callable,
                                                                         Executor executor)
        Submits a callable to an executor, returning the future representing the task. This mirrors ListeningExecutorService.submit(java.util.concurrent.Callable<T>), but only requires an Executor.
        Throws:
        RejectedExecutionException - if this task cannot be accepted for execution.

      • producerFromProvider

        public static <T> Producer<T> producerFromProvider(javax.inject.Provider<T> provider)
        Returns a producer that immediately executes the binding logic for the given provider every time it is called.
